Summary: a very bright pulsating light that truly stood out
trends: There has been one other sighting in Searchlight
There were no other sightings in Searchlight on or around December 12th 2002
divs: Sighting Detailswe were on top of this mountain over looking cebu city when I saw this bigbright star that stood out, it changed color as it pulsated first a bright whitecolor and the object seemed to get bigger then it changed color to a kind ofreddish orange color and the object seemed to get smaller. I had a camcorderwith me and I was watching it go through these changes and it was repeatingitself after a couple of seconds as if by rythum, I zoomed in as best I couldwithout distorting the object and I kept it as still as possible. I got somegreat footage. I dont know what this is, it might be something simple orsomething extrordinary. We were all calm when I first saw this and mentioned itto everybody, but I was the only one with a camcorder. It just hovered there inone spot didnt make any sounds but as far as judging distance it was more than amile away, I cant be exactly sure. we watched for about ten minutes then we hadto leave and that was the last I saw of it. Id like for someone if yourinterested to check this out and let me know what this thing was.
